Detailed Description

HWA H/W Parameters.

HWA parameters are used to with the HWA_open() call.

Field Documentation

volatile uint32_t HWA_HWAttrs_t::accelMemBaseAddr

HWA Accelerator processing memory base address

HWA Accelerator processing memory size in bytes

volatile uint32_t HWA_HWAttrs_t::ctrlBaseAddr

HWA Peripheral's base address for the control/common register space

volatile uint32_t HWA_HWAttrs_t::dssBaseAddr

DSS base address for the common settings

uint32_t HWA_HWAttrs_t::instanceNum

HWA Instance num - this is related to actual H/W instance of this IP

uint32_t HWA_HWAttrs_t::intNumDone

HWA Peripheral's interrupt vector for completion of all programmed paramset

uint32_t HWA_HWAttrs_t::intNumParamSet

HWA Peripheral's interrupt vector for individual paramset completion

uint32_t HWA_HWAttrs_t::numDmaChannels

Number of DMA channels available for HWA (src or dst)

uint32_t HWA_HWAttrs_t::numHwaParamSets

Number of HWA paramsets in this instance

volatile uint32_t HWA_HWAttrs_t::paramBaseAddr

HWA Peripheral's base address for the paramset space

volatile uint32_t HWA_HWAttrs_t::ramBaseAddr

HWA Peripheral's base address for the Window/Internal RAM space
